ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanical optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Standardization alone will not solve everything - further progress will require a revolution of efficiency and precision. New standards for optimization, accuracy, and capability will need to be developed. Once achieved, humanity's more wild ideas fall within reach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced framework replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the advent of optimized design and structural techniques, a wide variety of new possibilities for framework enhancements is unlocked. With greater specialization and higher quality, these frameworks are purpose built rather than generic solutions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Core assistance
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the acquisition of proper fabrication capabilities and a strong standardization scheme, advancements in the quality of mechanical parts is now within reach. There is spare space in all androids' heads, primarily for protective padding purposes - advanced specialized chips could occupy some of that space instead.
